column1: What the fuck do we all do now?

What job, currently done by immigrants, are you now looking forward to having a punt at?


Doctor or maybe a car washer for me.

Who is nervous about tomorrow and Friday?


Without getting to personal, does anyone's (future) careers/life depend on this result? I don't want to hear why you're voting leave/remain, I want to hear why you don't want the other side to win, or maybe even *need* your side to win.

Considering plans I've got that I want to do at both university and after graduating, I'm praying for a remain vote.
